# The soap extension

Configure the `soap` extension.

This extension provides support for writing SOAP servers and clients.

## PHP_EXT_SOAP

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_SOAP_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
